name: Date Knights
description:
Reina the Holy Knight must team up with her ex girlfriend, Evleen the Dark Knight. Together with Jakob and Armin, a rogue-mage couple, they must travel to the strange Rapt Frontier to discover why the barrier between worlds is weakening.

Delve into the mysteries of the frontier and explore the pocket realms contained within. Will Reina and Evleen rekindle their relationship, or will old wounds make them fall even further apart? Will Jakob and Armin get some much wanted alone time? Only time will tell!

A game started for the Rainbow of Positivity gaymake event on rpgmaker.net!

Character art by Opal Starlight! 

Title screen by MakioKuta! 

Main Menu by Racheal!

Special thanks to kentona for once again giving me the awesome name for this game and to Sooz for helping me write the parts that were giving me trouble and Racheal for some last-minute testing :DDD
